data.event: Such event took place on May 8, 1530, being the name given to the new village San Miguel de la Frontera (Saint Michael of the Frontier).
By 1586 the village had obtained the title of city.

event.title: a significant development and modernization since the beginning of the past decade

data.event: The sports infrastructure of San Miguel has had a significant development and modernization since the beginning of the past decade.

In November, San Miguel celebrates its municipal festivities in honor of "Nuestra Señora De La Paz" (Our Lady of Peace), the San Miguel Carnival being the final and main event that takes place on the last Saturday of the month.

event.title: takes place on the last Saturday

data.event: In November, San Miguel celebrates its municipal festivities in honor of "Nuestra Señora De La Paz" (Our Lady of Peace), the San Miguel Carnival being the final and main event that takes place on the last Saturday of the month.

event.title: The beginnings of the Carnival itself date from 1959

data.event: The beginnings of the Carnival itself date from 1959.
